TextView.android:text: Compliance Assessment of Maamta \n (Maamta k tameel check karna)

EditText.android:hint: Numbers of empty sachets returned by PW

TextView.android:text: Khali sacchat k tadaad jo PW na wapis kiya

EditText.android:hint: Total amount of sachet used by PW since last visit? Probe well

TextView.android:text: Aik dafa phir PW sa pochain k kitnay saahet use kiya pichli dafa sa lay k ab tak

EditText.android:hint: Amount of sachet which were used by someone else at home or outside the home since? Probe well

TextView.android:text: Sacchat k taadad jo kisi aur na istimaal kiya ghar ma ya ghar ma sa bahir kisi na

EditText.android:hint: Number of new sachets given today by health worker?

TextView.android:text: Aj team member na kitnay sachet PW ko diya us k tadad likhain
